title: Representing the Horizontal Axis
text: The input quantity along the horizontal axis is “years,” which we represent with the variable $$t$$ for time.
speech: The input quantity along the horizontal axis is “years,” which we represent with the variable  t  for time.
pacedSpeech: The input quantity along the horizontal axis is “years,” which we represent with the variable   t

title: Answer
text: The graph may continue to the left and right beyond what is viewed, but based on the portion of the graph that is visible, we can determine the domain as $$1973 \leq t \leq 2008$$.
speech: The graph may continue to the left and right beyond what is viewed, but based on the portion of the graph that is visible, we can determine the domain as  1973 is less than or equal to t is less than or equal to, 2008 .
